Comment: Article 5 of NATO states that an attack on one member is considered an attack on all. If a NATO member is attacked, all other members will come to its aid, potentially including the use of armed force, to restore and maintain security.  Denmark is part of NATO.   I think when the treaty was written, there was never any provision given for one NATO country attacking another, yet here we are, the United States is the first ever to threaten another NATO country.
